de.rwth.i2.attestor.main.settings

Class OptionSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.rwth.i2.attestor.main.settings.OptionSettings

  • public class OptionSettings
extends Object
    Collects all options that customize the state space generation.
    Author:
    Hannah Arndt, Christoph

        public int getMinDereferenceDepth()
        Returns:
        The minimal distance between variables and nodes in an embedding before abstraction is performed.

      • setMinDereferenceDepth

      • isNullDistanceEnabled

        public boolean isNullDistanceEnabled()
        Returns:
        True if and only if the minimal dereference distance should be ignored for the null node.

      • setNullDistanceEnabled

        public void setNullDistanceEnabled(boolean nullDistanceEnabled)
        Parameters:
        nullDistanceEnabled - True if and only if the minimal dereference distance should be ignored for the null node.

      • getAggressiveAbstractionThreshold

        public int getAggressiveAbstractionThreshold()
        Returns:
        The minimal size of heap configurations before restrictions to potential abstractions are ignored.

      • setAggressiveAbstractionThreshold

        public void setAggressiveAbstractionThreshold(int aggressiveAbstractionThreshold)

      • isAggressiveReturnAbstraction

        public boolean isAggressiveReturnAbstraction()
        Returns:
        True if and only if aggressive abstraction (ignoring minimal dereference depths) is performed before procedure returns.

      • setAggressiveReturnAbstraction

        public void setAggressiveReturnAbstraction(boolean aggressiveReturnAbstraction)

      • isRemoveDeadVariables

        public boolean isRemoveDeadVariables()
        Returns:
        True if and only if dead variables are deleted from heap configurations whenever possible.

      • setRemoveDeadVariables

        public void setRemoveDeadVariables(boolean removeDeadVariables)
        Parameters:
        removeDeadVariables - True if and only if dead variables are deleted from heap configurations whenever possible.

      • isIndexedMode

        public boolean isIndexedMode()
        Returns:
        True if and only if an indexed program analysis is performed.

        Parameters:
        indexedMode - True if and only if an indexed program analysis is performed.
